name: Ridiculous Minigolf
description:
Do you like minigolf? Play it in a way you never had before! Ridiculous Minigolf is an enjoyable escape from the stressful and competitive PC games that are played today. In Ridiculous Minigolf, you hit your customization ball though captivating obstacles. Play in the peaceful logging forest, or take your ball to a futuristic space station where our worlds physics are not at play or go back in time to the war torn battlefields of WW2. (Coming soon)

Controls:

Hold SPACE and move your mouse forward and back to change your power.

Release SPACE to shoot!

Credits

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Werq", "Inspired", "Welcome to the show" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
